subject: Magic and Magicians
Baseball
Stadiums and Arenas
Yankee Stadium (NYC)
lead_paragraph: A construction worker’s attempt to curse the Yankees by burying a Red Sox jersey at the team’s new stadium has raised questions about the nature of the occult.
snippet: A construction worker’s attempt to curse the Yankees by burying a Red Sox jersey at the team’s new stadium has raised questions about the nature of the occult.
